'''Trial of the Soul Bell''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Girdle of the Sands]], [[Sumeru]].

Interacting with the bell will begin a time trial challenge, and the player must travel towards each checkpoint and reach the end. Often, [[Four-Leaf Sigil]]s can be used to complete the trial faster.

They act similarly to Open-World [[Time Trial Challenge]]s.

Completing all 9 of them grants the {{Achievement|Bifröst}}.
